document.full_text: chip designer rambus  has agreed to buy privately-held cryptography research, a security technology company, in a deal worth $342.5 million, adding to its portfolio of technology available for licensing.
document.title: rambus buys security technology firm cri
lines_and_colors: chip designer rambus  has agreed to buy privately-held cryptography research, a security technology company, in a deal worth $342.5 million, adding to its portfolio of technology available for licensing.
